channel.title: Weapon i made
channel.description:
ok so i made a weapon from scratch so let see what you guys decide to flame about now i dont mind if you tell me to make it better just dont be an ass about it so here it is [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/WEPPPPPPPPPPP.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/WEPPPPPP2.jpg[/img]
here it is equipped
[IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/WEPPPPP3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/WEPPPPPPPP4.jpg[/img]
i removed the legs for this one because they collided with the weapon
[IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/WEPPPPPPPP5.jpg[/img]
here are the parts of the model [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/picc3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/pic2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/picccccc.jpg[/img]
heres a wireframe view of the parts and the full model for you people who wont stop bitching bout it [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/wireframe.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/wireee5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/wireee4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/wireee3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/wire222.jpg[/img]
this is the picture i used for this model
[IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/claw.jpg[/img]
heres a glaive i made from scratch also [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/glaive.jpg[/img]
wireframe
[IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/glaivewire.jpg[/img]

item.title: Weapon i made
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The wireframe is terrible. Everything just mixes together and makes it all a inconceivable mess. I can’t even see where those parts you showed go together. On the other hand, the reference picture looks nice. And don’t you dare say I’m flaming, I’m telling the truth nicely.

Read full topic

i know what it is i just didnt know how to activate it but i figured it out and i posted wireframe pictures

Your quite clearly the dumb one without a wire frame you wouldn’t have no chance at making this, to get the wire frame just turn off faces…

when i made these models i drew and outline of them using the top perspective view and that view already has wireframe enabled i jsut didnt know thats what it was but i psoted woreframe pictures for everyone and i also posted the picture i used to outline these models

item.title: Weapon i made
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

iatchi1019:

no you do not need wireframe to make a model if you think that then your clearly the dumb one the way i created the model was changed the view to the top perspective then drew out the shape by creating lines then connected the lines with faces cloned the flat model moved the clone up a little connected then 2 and then made a blade edge if you dotn think i can make a model or animate then give me a model to make and animate and i will im sick of you guys thinking you know everything idk ill do whatever you want me to to prove i made these

For god’s sakes; a ‘wireframe’ is a picture of the little lines connecting the points on the model (the pink lines herp derp). You need to learn some modeling terminology.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon i made
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

[quote=“iatchi1019, post:12, topic:364254”][*1] "use guys are seriously retarded "

[*2] “idk how to do wireframe”[/quote]

[*1]Lawl.

[*2] Okay, If you don’t know how to post a wireframe. I HIGHLY doubt you animated, (Or even created) Anything you have posted. When you animate (Real animation, Not a click with .Datmaker) You use wireframes. When you model, You use wireframes. When you color, You use wireframes (Most of the time).

Read full topic
